name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Go Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions for healthcare and finance sectors. Proficient in **Go**, with a strong foundation in **Microservices**, **Distributed Systems**, and **Event-driven architecture**. Adept in CI/CD practices and utilizing **Version Control** systems, ensuring smooth development workflows and efficient product delivery. Experienced in **Kubernetes** for orchestrating containerized applications and managing scalable microservices. Skilled in API design and integration, enhancing inter-service communication and functionality across systems. Demonstrated ability to adapt to a **Startup Mindset**, prioritizing tasks effectively within dynamic teams to drive outcomes.

Technical expertise also includes modern technologies like JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Flutter, with hands-on proficiency across the full stack utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building and deploying **cloud-native applications** on **Azure** and **AWS**, leading the development of enterprise platforms that leverage AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and intelligent decision-making. Strong background in ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, while maintaining secure and maintainable solutions.

Passionate about driving impactful systems development with a blend of technical expertise and real-world application.

• Played a key role in building distributed systems that handle **1 million+** transactions daily, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.
• Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving team practices with a startup mindset, aiming for rapid iteration and deployment of features.
• Managed multiple project priorities, leveraging strong organizational skills to ensure timely delivery of mission-critical features and enhancements.
